# fillColor

**Instance Property**

The color used to fill the shape.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var fillColor: UIColor { get set }
```

```swift
@MainActor var fillColor: NSColor { get set }
```

```swift
var fillColor: UIColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default fill color is `[SKColor clearColor]`, which means the shape is not filled.

## Filling a Shape

- **fillTexture**: The texture used to fill the shape.

items.description: The texture used to fill the shape.
